title: Chocolate Cherry Breakfast
directions: In the jar of a blender, combine the cherries, yogurt, milk, cocoa, and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired.
Pour into a glass. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 1⁄4 cup frozen unsweetened sweet cherries (not thawed)
1 tablespoon sour cherry marmalade (Casa Giulia Brand)
